name: Space Man, Baby!
description:
After crashing into a mysterious planet, He needs to get back into his ship to go back home! They’re a bit of a cluz and crash in other parts of the planet, but that’s ok! It will take bravery and control to get back home, and this spaceman looks to be up to the challenge!

Use the arrow keys to move. Wall Jump from wall to wall! Boost Flowers??? Sorry, it’s a bit short...
